home_title: We develop Nature-Based Solutions for ecosystem restoration.
home_pillar_c1_phrase: We specialize in the restoration of natural capital, with a focus on rejuvenating and enhancing depleted ecosystems through enriching and reforesting initiatives employing indigenous species.
home_pillar_c2_phrase: Our comprehensive biodiversity conservation program involves conducting fauna inventories to identify different species and populations, including those facing endangerment.
home_pillar_c3_phrase: We collaborate on community-driven sustainable projects, allocating a percentage of carbon credit sales to support local institutions in education, healthcare, and infrastructure development.
home_pillar_c4_phrase: We harness advanced surveillance technology to effectively monitor large-scale landscapes, incorporating innovative solutions such as IoT, blockchain, drones, and more to enhance our ecological endeavors.
home_pillar_c5_phrase: We ensure daily protection of the project area, fortified by the acquisition of rapid attack equipment designed for early-stage fire control.
home_map_title: Explore our restoration project in the Paranaense Rainforest
home_info_c1_phrase: Join the business solution to address the climate crisis and offset greenhouse gas emissions.
home_info_c2_phrase: Join us in promoting effective ecosystem restoration and sustainable development practices to benefit both biodiversity and local communities.
home_award_c1_phrase: **Premio ciudadanía Empresaria AmCham.** Premio por la categoría Huella de Carbono (2022) y Sustentabilidad en los Procesos (2024)
home_award_c2_phrase: Premio Sustentabilidad en categoría Pyme 2024 por la CCI France Argentine
home_award_c3_phrase: Programa de aceleración de Impacta VC
home_award_c5_phrase: Fuimos seleccionados como reconocimiento y para pitchear ante el programa de BCG  y Climate Champions

home_press_c6_title: Usan blockchain para salvar a los bosques nativos
home_press_26_c1_title: Carbon bonds, another smokeless industry that begins to bring dollars
about_phrase1: Nideport is a developer of carbon credit projects, dedicated to ecological restoration and biodiversity conservation with a social approach.
about_phrase2: Through reforestation, forest enrichment, biodiversity enhancement and empowerment of local communities, we restore ecosystem services for present and future generations.
about_join_our_team_desc: We are looking for professional profiles for future opportunities in Nideport, we want to meet you!
project_gs1_phrase: Over the past 120 years, the Atlantic Forest has suffered intense extraction of native species and loss of structural integrity—first driven by industrialization and urbanization, and since the late 20th century by the expansion of mechanized agriculture, which consolidated deforestation and habitat fragmentation, leading to losses in biodiversity and essential ecosystem services.
project_data_c3_parag: 2,455,977 tons of total carbon sequestered in forest biomass
project_info_data_10: Forest fires, poaching and illegal logging
project_data_gs1: We use native species to promote biodiversity in 22,878 of its hectares and thus restore the original structure of the ecosystem. Scroll through our interactive map to find the actions we are taking and the next stages of our project.
project_object_phrase1: Together with specialized professionals, we conduct annual flora and fauna surveys to estimate species richness and the density or abundance of their populations. We prioritize monitoring keystone species, whose population dynamics allow us to assess ecosystem health and the impact of our interventions. This evidence base—integrating field monitoring and detection technologies—supports our compliance with the Climate, Community & Biodiversity (CCB) Standards at the Gold level, reflecting a verifiable commitment to sustainability and conservation.
project_object_phrase2: Selva Paranaense Vida Nativa is located near the Mbyá-Guaraní community of Tekoa Alecrín and other rural communities. Together with them, we carry out activities that strengthen relationships and deepen understanding of their culture and social organization, respecting their protocols for intercommunity relations and their relationship with the forest. We have implemented a public consultation with rural communities and a Free, Prior and Informed Consent (FPIC) process with the Indigenous community, aiming to establish a consensual and long-term collaboration, safeguard their rights, and co-design support programs for climate change adaptation and for improving their living conditions within the framework of their own worldview and relationship with nature.
project_object_phrase3: At Nideport, we harness technology to serve the forest and those who protect it. Satellites, drones, IoT, monitoring cameras, and biotechnology are integrated into an artificial intelligence-powered platform that detects anomalies, generates verifiable automated alerts, and ensures full traceability of every intervention. This enables us to make precise decisions, reduce risks, and streamline MRV—accelerating native forest restoration and supporting ultra-high-quality carbon credits.

projects_credit_data6_d_subvalue: Agriculture Forestry and Other Land Use

banner.text: We use cookies to improve your experience. By accepting, you allow us to use cookies for analytics and marketing.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Nideport protects your personal data and uses cookies on its website.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.content: We are Nideport, a company dedicated to ecosystem restoration, biodiversity conservation, and sustainable development with local communities in the Atlantic Forest of Misiones, Argentina. Our approach integrates technology, social action, and environmental regeneration to create ecological, social, and economic impact.

dataCollected.title: What data do we collect?
dataCollected.content:
a) Data you provide directly
- Name, email, company, and message, if you use our contact form or reach out to us.
- Your email may also be used to send newsletters or commercial communications about our projects, only if you provide explicit consent.
- Payment information (only if purchasing carbon credits), managed by certified third-party providers. We never store sensitive data such as credit cards on our servers.

b) Automatically collected data
When visiting our website, we collect via cookies and similar technologies:
- Anonymized IP addresses, processed in aggregate for statistical purposes
- Browser type, operating system, and device
- Pages visited, session duration, and on-site behavior
- Language preferences and general location

purposes.title: How do we use your data?
purposes.content:
- Respond to inquiries about our restoration projects or carbon credits.
- Improve user experience on our website.
- Analyze site usage (with your consent).
- Display relevant advertising or conduct remarketing (only if you accept marketing cookies).

Nideport does not carry out automated decision-making or profiling that produces legal or significant effects on users.

cookies.title: Use of cookies and tracking technologies
cookies.content: We use different types of cookies:

rows.marketingTools: Google Ads, Hotjar, Google Tag Manager

legalBasis.title: Legal basis for processing
legalBasis.content:
- Consent: for analytics and marketing cookies, and commercial communications.
- Legitimate interest: for technical website operation and anonymous internal analysis.
- Contract performance: if you contact us to acquire services.

dataRecipients.title: Who do we share your data with?
dataRecipients.content:
We do not sell your data. We only share it with:
- Service providers: Google (Analytics, Ads, Tag Manager), Hotjar, and secure hosting platforms.
- Competent authorities, if legally required.

All our providers comply with international data protection standards.

internationalTransfers.title: International transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Some providers (such as Google and Hotjar) process data on servers located outside Argentina (e.g., in the U.S.). These transfers are carried out under recognized safeguards, such as the Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).

yourRights.title: Your rights
yourRights.content:
As a data subject, you have the right to:
- Access, rectify, or request the erasure (deletion) of your data.
- Object to or restrict its processing.
- Withdraw your consent at any time.
- Lodge a complaint with Uruguay's Personal Data Regulatory and Control Unit (URCDP).

Your personal data is governed by Uruguay's Law No. 18.331 on Personal Data Protection and Habeas Data, its Regulatory Decree No. 414/009, and complementary regulations issued by the URCDP.

You may exercise these rights by writing to: info[at]nideport.com.

security.title: Information Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These include data encryption in transit (SSL/TLS), access controls to our systems, and regular staff training on data protection.

dataRetention.title: Retention period
dataRetention.content:
Your data is retained only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or while you maintain a relationship with us. It is then securely deleted or anonymized.

Data used for certification, environmental traceability, or carbon project integrity is processed in an aggregated, technical, and non-identifiable manner and does not constitute personal data.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy. The current version will always be available on this page with a new "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
Do you have questions or wish to manage your privacy preferences?
Please write to: info[at]nideport.com
Or use our contact form.

privacy.note: This policy applies solely to the website https://www.nideport.com and not to external sites.
